data.comment: The match is underway in Wolverhampton.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Daniel Podence for Wolverhampton drives towards goal at Molineux Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Wolverhampton close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Daniel Podence of Wolverhampton gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton's Raul Jimenez misses with an attempt on goal.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a throw-in for Wolverhampton, close to Newcastle's area.
Wolverhampton are coming forward and Raul Jimenez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
Throw-in for Newcastle at Molineux Stadium.
Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, Callum Wilson (Newcastle) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 19, Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Can Newcastle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolverhampton's half?
In the minute 21, Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Wolverhampton.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Goal kick for Newcastle at Molineux Stadium.
Wolverhampton have a dangerous throw-in.
Wolverhampton needs to be cautious. Newcastle have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 28, Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Newcastle.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Lee Stephen Mason awards Newcastle a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Throw-in high up the field for Wolverhampton in Wolverhampton.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Wolverhampton.
Newcastle will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Wolverhampton.
In the minute 40, Miguel Almiron (Newcastle) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Newcastle's Allan Saint-Maximin gets in a shot on goal at Molineux Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Lee Stephen Mason awards Newcastle a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Wolverhampton.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Wolverhampton.
The first-half has come to a close in Wolverhampton.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Molineux Stadium.
Raul Jimenez for Wolverhampton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
In the minute 48, In Wolverhampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Newcastle needs to be cautious. Wolverhampton have an attacking throw-in.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a throw-in for Wolverhampton, close to Newcastle's area.
In the minute 51, Wolverhampton are pushing forward but Pedro Neto's finish is wide of the goal.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Molineux Stadium.
Wolverhampton's Pedro Neto breaks free at Molineux Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Newcastle at Molineux Stadium.
In the minute 55, Lee Stephen Mason awards the away team a throw-in.
Wolverhampton's Daniel Podence gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
Throw-in Newcastle.
In the minute 58, Wolverhampton have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolverhampton.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Newcastle push forward at Molineux Stadium and Miguel Almiron gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Wolverhampton defence.
Throw-in for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Newcastle at Molineux Stadium.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in the half of Newcastle.
In the minute 67, Wolverhampton's Ruben Neves is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Adama Traore is on a sub for Daniel Podence for Wolverhampton.
In the minute 68, Nuno Espirito Santo (Wolverhampton) is making a second substitution, with Fernando Marcal replacing Romain Saiss.
Newcastle drive upfield and Jeff Hendrick gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Wolverhampton defender.
In the minute 69, Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
Pedro Neto (Wolverhampton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 72, Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
In the minute 76, In Wolverhampton, Pedro Neto of Wolverhampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Raul Jimenez (Wolverhampton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Raul Jimenez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Wolverhampton.
In the minute 78, Fernando Marcal (Wolverhampton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lee Stephen Mason awards the away team a throw-in.
Newcastle make their first substitution with Joelinton replacing Ryan Fraser.
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 79, Sean Longstaff is replacing Allan Saint-Maximin for the away team.
Free kick Wolverhampton.
In the minute 80, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Raul Jimenez.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a Newcastle throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 83, The home team replace Ruben Neves with Joao Moutinho.
Can Newcastle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolverhampton's half?
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Newcastle are in shooting range from this free kick.
Andy Carroll is replacing Jamaal Lascelles for Newcastle at Molineux Stadium.
Jacob Murphy gets an equalizer for Newcastle. The score is now 1-1.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Newcastle.
Lee Stephen Mason awards Newcastle a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Newcastle to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a Newcastle throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Lee Stephen Mason blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
